Name: [Artifice] Mechanical Pigeon
Desc:
The amount of Gear Coins you gain from Gear Coin events is <color=#CF4029>halved</color> on the current floor.
When you reach the next floor, the repayment will be reduced by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.
Desc2: Since everyone knows the magic is fake, there's no need to use real pigeons either, right?
